title: lux new skin technical problem
body:
Hi, I have received the star guardian lux skin from my friend as a gift like 5 days ago(the first time you release it). then it goes to unavailable these days,  now you enable it again, but seems I dont own it anymore, it still require me to buy it and my friend doesnt get the refund, I can still find the gift information from the gifting history, please help me out ~~~~
gift was send from name: xiangpiaopiao 
to: lebaishi
attached is the screen shot of gift history.

replies.body:
Well, you have the evidence (although a transaction number would have been solid). I suggest you make a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) about it, and the red bot will instruct you further.

Best of luck.
and this is from lebaishi account
